channel.title: Prestige System
channel.description:
Hey guys, can someone make me a prestige system like this.
So you talk to the shop owner and click prestige mode how do i make it check if you have 99 everything then reset everything and give you 1 prestige point? Thanks guys this would really help I will release this prestige system and give you credits thanks :) I really need this thanks.

item.title: Prestige System
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Have you attempted this? We’re not going to spoon feed you. If you’ve attempted to write this code and still have problems, feel free to create a new thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Prestige System
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

Nobody is going to write you a system like that for free. Try to write it yourself and if you have problems with it somebody here will help you :).

We are not your slaves.

Read full topic

item.title: Prestige System
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Not going to write it. Scape-JAVA is 100% correct. Do something like this

if(npcID == xxxx){
NPCDialogue = xxxx;
}

and

if(NPCDialogue = xxxx && totalLevel >= xxxx){
resetStats();
prestigePoints += 1;
} else {
NPCDialogue == xxxx;
}

Read full topic
